comments: Dr. Pav provides top notch quality learning and is an inspiration.

I have never had a professor be so demeaning, disrespectful and rude; ever. I withdrew from the class because I did not want a grade from Darmanyan on my transcripts, whether that was an F or an A. My criticism is not of the demands he placed on students for the material (I have been a Dean\'s LIst Honor Roll student for my last 8 semesters).

DEFINITELY THE HARDEST CLASS I\'VE EVER TAKEN BUT THE MOST REWARDING. IF YOU THINK YOU CAN ENROLL AND PASS ALONG THRU IT WITHOUT WORK, YOU\'RE MISTAKEN. I\'M GETTING INTO NURSING AND THIS PROFESSOR HAS TAUGHT ME THE MEANING OF HARD WORK. I RECOMMEND HIM CAUSE HE\'S A NOT B.S. TYPE OF GUY AND YOU\'LL LEARN A LOT BUT GET READY TO WORK YOUR BUTT OFF!

A test/week, a lab report/week. tests are on the begining of the class. You need to study hard and be able to use basic knowledge to solve harder questions on the test. However, you\'ll learn a lot. Helpful to future study.
